FuncDef: This command specifies the RADIUS cache key that is used to match the information in subsequent DHCP requests for authorization.
CLIs: key packet-type { accept | request } attribute-type <attribute-type> [ vendor <vendor-id> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the packet type of the RADIUS messages to use to generate the key for the cache of this RADIUS proxy server. Values-accept, request.
Specifies the RADIUS attribute type to cache for this RADIUS proxy. server. Values-1 to 255.
Specifies the RADIUS vendor ID. Values-1 to 16777215, nokia.
